column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A man drove a Corolla car at high speeds into a concrete divider
column4: causing the car to overturn several times. The driver was slightly injured in the incident at 2:20 AM on July 12
column6: along Street 289/Street 528. In Sangkat Boeung Kak I
column8: Phnom Penh.------According to sources at the scene
column10: a man was seen driving the Corolla with license plate Phnom Penh 2AF-3851
column11: along Street 289 from north to south at breakneck speeds. When it reached the corner of Street 528
column12: it hit the divider and overturned several times
column13: ending  upside down.------People at the scene managed to lift the car back up and get the driver out. He suffered minor injuries and got on a motorbike and told the authorities he would go and treat his injuries first. ------NKD
